summary: Provides a command‑line interface for exploring Ansible collections, listing available plugins and roles, displaying their short and full documentation, and generating ready‑to‑paste playbook snippets, with internal helpers for loading role metadata and building documentation summaries.
business_intent: Enable Ansible users and developers to quickly discover and understand collection content, retrieve detailed documentation, and create example playbooks, thereby improving usability and adoption of Ansible plugins and roles.
